attributes.action: Stop unnecessary name branding, unless it's out & out derogatory.
attributes.additional_details:
Defamation of character....
People have lost jobs and their livelihoods,  their homes, their family and friends, all because of unnecessary name branding, just for showing concern.
attributes.background:
Stop unnecessary name branding, such as... Racist, Far-Right, Homophobic, Transphobic, Islamophobic, Fascist & Nazi, this is defamation of character.
Unless a person uses out & out derogatory words, name branding needs to be outlawed.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure what you mean by "out & out derogatory words" and "unnecessary name branding". We are also not sure how "unnecessary name branding" would be outlawed.
